info.task: operate a switch in the on state
info.title: Operate a switch in the on state in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Notifications' switch, and sets its state to 'on'

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, change its state to 'off'.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Notifications' switch, change its state to 'off'.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'off', is conveyed
